briefTitle: Study of Efficacy and Safety of Brolucizumab vs. Aflibercept in Chinese Patients With Neovascular Age-Related Macular Degeneration
officialTitle: A Twelve-Month, Randomized, Double-Masked, Multicenter, Phase III, Two-Arm Study Comparing the Efficacy and Safety of Brolucizumab 6 mg Versus Aflibercept in Chinese Patients With Neovascular Age-Related Macular Degeneration
summary: To compare brolucizumab to aflibercept in Chinese patients with untreated active choroidal neovascularization (CNV) secondary to age-related macular degeneration (AMD)

primaryOutcome.measure: Change From Baseline at Week 48 in Best-Corrected Visual Acuity in Study Eye
